text: 29:11 Aisaia 40:9-11; Jeremaia 30:9-10; 30:18-22Kɨ Ikiavɨra Itir God, kɨ bizir ian akurvaghsɨ damuamiba, kɨ adagh nɨghnigha dagh fogha gɨfa. Kɨ deraghvɨra ia damutɨ ia navir amɨrizim ko, dabirabir aghuim ikiasa kɨ ifonge. Kɨ pazɨ ia damuan aghua. Ia bizir kɨ damuamin kabagh nɨghnɨgh, dughiar kam mɨzuam ikɨtɨ, an otogham.
